name: A 90s Dream
description:
What Were The Games Like In The 90s? Well Today Your Going To Play Games That feel like there inv a arcade machine!

How To Play:

Pong: Use the arrow keys to move you pong around and hit the ball 10 times to go to the next game

Platformer: Use Arrow Keys to move around and avoid lava 

Moon Invaders:  Move your ship around by using arrow keys and shoot aliens by clicking the left muse button but watch out for bombs
